thread.title: Derby 4 Wolves 2 - Fan pictures

title: Derby 4 Wolves 2 - Fan pictures
text:
Tweet 
Check out our gallery of fan pictures as Derby beat Wolves 4-2 at the iPro. 
Wolves were comfortably beaten as Derby scored four goals and missed a penalty on a sobering afternoon for Kenny Jackett's team. 
Chris Martin scored twice - opening the scoring in the third minute as Wolves made a sluggish start - and also saw a penalty saved by Emiliano Martinez as Derby threatened to run riot. 
Some shoddy defending from Wolves contributed heavily to the defeat, with Martinez at fault for Martin's second when he failed to claim a Bradley Johnson cross. 
Johnson himself scored Derby's third with Wolves unable to clear a corner, although the scoreline was made respectable by Adam Le Fondre's second half goal to bring it back to 4-2, after Johnny Russell had increased Derby's lead after the break. More on this story:
